title: Astroneer

description: Sons of the Forest is a survival horror game, sequel to The Forest, where players find themselves in a mysterious forest inhabited by hostile mutants, and must scavenge for resources, build shelter, and uncover the dark secrets of the island.

title: Resident Evil 4
description: Resident Evil 4 is a survival horror game set in a rural village in Europe where the player controls Leon S. Kennedy, a former police officer, as he battles hordes of infected villagers and cultists while trying to rescue the President's daughter.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260X

title: Metro Exodus

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580

recommended.Graphics: AMD R9 290X / Nvidia GTX 970

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480

description: Far Cry 3 is an open-world first-person shooter set on a tropical island. Players assume the role of Jason Brody, a young man stranded on the island, as he fights his way through hostile mercenaries and wildlife to rescue his friends and escape the island.

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980

title: Assassin's Creed III
description: Assassin's Creed III is an action-adventure game set during the American Revolution. Players take on the role of Connor, a Native American assassin fighting against the Templars. The game features a vast open world, naval combat, and a compelling narrative.

title: Valheim
description: Valheim is a survival game set in a procedurally generated world inspired by Norse mythology. Players must gather resources, build shelters, and craft weapons to survive against various enemies and bosses. With its open-world exploration and cooperative multiplayer, Valheim offers a challenging and immersive experience for players.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 500 / AMD Radeon HD 7000

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 900 / AMD Radeon RX 500

title: Watch Dogs 2
description: Watch Dogs 2 is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft. Set in a fictionalized version of the San Francisco Bay Area, players control Marcus Holloway, a hacker who works with the hacking group DedSec to take down the city's surveillance system. With its emphasis on hacking and exploration, Watch Dogs 2 offers a unique gameplay experience.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 290X

title: Devil May Cry 5
description: Devil May Cry 5 is a stylish action game developed by Capcom. Players control three characters—Dante, Nero, and newcomer V—as they battle demons in a fictional city. With its fast-paced combat, impressive visuals, and rock-solid gameplay, Devil May Cry 5 is a must-play for fans of the series.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480

title: Dark Souls III
description: Dark Souls III is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware. Set in a dark fantasy world, players embark on a challenging journey to defeat powerful enemies and bosses. With its intricate level design, deep combat mechanics, and atmospheric storytelling, Dark Souls III offers a rewarding experience for players seeking a tough but rewarding challenge.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. Set in the fictional state of San Andreas, players follow the lives of three criminals as they plan and execute a series of heists. With its expansive open world, engaging story, and multiplayer mode, Grand Theft Auto V remains one of the most popular and successful games of all time.

minimum.Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor @ 2.5GHz

title: NBA 2k24
description: NBA 2K24 is a basketball simulation game developed by Visual Concepts. Offering realistic gameplay and stunning graphics, NBA 2K24 allows players to experience the excitement of professional basketball. With its extensive career mode, online multiplayer, and immersive presentation, NBA 2K24 is a must-have for basketball fans.

minimum.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 450 / AMD Radeon HD 7770

recommended.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 270

title: Rainbow Six Siege
description: Rainbow Six Siege is a tactical first-person shooter developed by Ubisoft. Set in various locations around the world, players engage in intense close-quarters combat between attackers and defenders. With its emphasis on strategy, teamwork, and destructible environments, Rainbow Six Siege offers a unique and challenging multiplayer experience.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Horizon Zero Dawn is an action role-playing game developed by Guerrilla Games. Set in a post-apocalyptic world where robotic creatures roam the earth, players control Aloy, a hunter, as she navigates through various landscapes and uncovers the mysteries of her past. With its breathtaking visuals, engaging story, and satisfying combat, Horizon Zero Dawn offers an unforgettable gaming experience.
